Author: saturninelys
Text: I felt this. I restricted pretty much the entirety of February, March, and April this year— didn’t tell anyone and never acted differently (I’d eat around them but pretty much no other time). I lost 20 pounds in two months and swore there was no difference. Meanwhile, my mom would tell me my clothes were practically falling off my body, my best friend told me I was getting skinnier every time she saw me, even my friend’s *grandma* told me I must have lost my “baby fat”. Everyone was always telling me I looked tired and trying to feed me. It’s crazy how much your ED can deceive you because as much I tried to keep it lowkey, so many people actually *do* notice.
